Orion

Collaborative three.js experiment, made with a friend of mine.

He wrote the initial shader, I polished it and built a little generative app around it.

Launch

Vesuna

Utility to use texts as random seeds, based on Johannes Baagøe's Alea PRNG. Replacing the typical Math.random(), it allows to repeat precisely complex generative outcomes.

Open Github

Textformer

Small javascript library for easy text animations, using random character changes. Includes a barebones tweening engine I wrote for it, which was total overkill as it works great with gsap, anime.js etc.

Open Github

Disintegrator

Real-time destruction of three.js meshes.

Tesselation, custom buffer attributes, and a mix of random + simplex noise.

Launch

Sketches

Aiming to constantly improve and learn new things, I do many little side projects and experiments. I call them "sketches".

Browse

Infos

About me

Hello!

My name is Pierre "Keda" Audéoud. I'm a 38-years-old french creative coder, working freelance and living in Paris. I'm currently looking to join a creative studio full-time.

Most of my code is written in vanilla javascript and three.js, with a strong focus on motion, randomness and interactivity.

I also really like GLSL & sci-fi aesthetics.

Contact

Say hi: contact@pierrekeda.com
